title.narrative: Support to SUN Secretariat for the Visit of the SUN Global Coordinator and Nutrition Fair

description.narrative: The ‘support to Scaling- UP Nutrition (SUN) Secretariat for visit of SUN Global Coordinator and National Nutrition Fair’ proejct in Sierra Leone, implemented by SUN Secretariat aims to draw attention of the public and development partners on the significance of food and nutrition in building human capital and also trigger the mobilisation of resources to boost Sierra Leone’s national food and nutrition agenda. The objectives of the project are to ascertain progress made so far at country level in terms of reducing hunger and malnutrition and re-energize the campaign among key stakeholders in the fight against malnutrition. The key activity for the visit is organizing the National Nutrition Fair.

receiver-org.ref: Sun Secretariat Office of the Vice President
